data.description:
2MD is a groundbreaking motion-controlled VR football game. Draw the plays and throw, hand-off, or run the ball before the clock runs out!

‣ Throw like a pro with realistic motion controls in a seated, standing, room-scale, or full field-scale experience!
‣ Exciting presentation with a 7-round heat and rapid-fire bonus rounds.
‣ Play 2-minute drill or 20, 40, or 60 minute full length exhibition games!
‣ Draw unique offensive plays in VR!
‣ Featuring 56 customizable teams across 8 leagues including college, indoor, professional, and fantasy player types!
‣ Customize your controls to fit your throwing style!
‣ Dynamically become the ball-carrier and even catch the ball yourself with manual receiver control!
‣ Now featuring a speed boost when playing wide receiver mode!
‣ Variable weather conditions including sun, rain, wind, and snow!
‣ Over 60 immersive stadiums filled with thousands of screaming fans.
‣ Challenging AI, achievements, leaderboards and a virtual trophy case.
‣ Watch the action unfold on the on-field spectator display live!
‣ Now with full support for the bHaptics Tacsuit series!
‣ Full gameplay parity for Quest, Quest 2, and now Quest 3!
‣ Includes Quest 3 specific graphical enhancements for maximum clarity and performance.

2MD: VR Football Unleashed ALL-STAR 1.8 update notes:
---------------------------------------------
> Quest 3 enhancements enabled if you have a Quest 3!
> Updated android framework to version 32 for increased stability and performance for all devices
> Addition of "Announcer Volume" slider in the practice field, so you can adjust all the levels to your liking in all modes!
> Additional small tweaks and updates

2MD: VR Football Unleashed ALL-STAR 1.77 update notes:
---------------------------------------------
> Quest 3 enhancements enabled if you have a Quest 3! these include:
- Native 2,064 x 2,208 (2K) per eye render resolution for Quest 3 devices
- Increase to 8x antialiasing for smoother visuals
- Increased shadow render resolution
- Realtime shadow distance now extends fully downfield
> Updated android framework to version 32 for increased stability and performance for all devices
bHaptics and faster WRs
Music volume added to options panel

Added BIRDSEYE system for all users!
Now, by pressing either the left menu button or the Y button before the snap, you'll get an overhead view of the field and your play!

The 1.75 update includes:
- Addition of weather effects to the exhibition stadiums!
- Addition of new BIRDSEYE play cam!
- various bug fixes and stability improvements

What's new in 1.53:
----------------------------------
-Receiver mode sees a huge update!  now pick between FACING, LEADING, and ZONE catch modes!
-Our animation system has been updated to 2.0! players on both sides can now jump for the ball!
-We've added helmet designs for each team!
-Bonus league now features mascot on mascot action!
-Exhibition mode has been updated to include a clock countdown!
-If you like what you see and want to see more, think about giving us a rating or review!

The 2022 Big Game Update is here!
-----------------------------------------------------
-NEW manual receiver mode!  Now you'll have the chance to catch the ball yourself!
-NEW massive graphical overhaul (Quest 2 only): realtime lighting and shadow, player names on jerseys, new sideline details, new audience reactions and more.
-NEW dummyvision enabled for all fields (Quest 2 only)
-NEW variable weather conditions added to Bruiser and Amazon league games
-NEW Bonus league challenge featuring vintage 1920s players

What's new in 1.42 (hey, that rhymes!)
---------------
• New Bonus league content for the holidays: Snowmen Attack!  They were too scary for Halloween, so now you get to pass the snowball with some giant snowmen.  Throw a trophy at them and see what happens...
• We're excited to reveal the new RECEIVER CHALLENGE!  This is a sneak preview of a new mechanic coming to 2MD, for absolutely free! Do *you* have what it takes to catch the ball? Prove it!  And remember t send captures of your best catches to us on Twitter @truantpixel !
• Need to practice your field goal throw? There's a field for that now! Click on the shoes to practice putting the ball between the uprights!
• If you love the game and want to see more, don't forget to leave a rating and review if you have time!  

And, of course, happy holidays!
